ruleBookInfo.author: div.booknav2>p:first-of-type>a@text
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookId = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.htm/)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "https://cdn.shucdn.com/files/article/image/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: div.booknav2>h1@text

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
result = result.replace(/.*\n/,"").replace(/.*\n/,"").replace(/\s+?\SÊú¨Á´†ÂÆå\S\s*/,"");

if (title.length < 5) { result = result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?${title}\\n`),"") } 
else { result = result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?${title.substr(0,title.length*2/3)}.*\\n`),"") }

result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?Á¨¨\\S+?Á´†.{0,${title.length}}\\n`),"");
</js>

</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: div[class="pure-u-xl-5-6 pure-u-lg-5-6 pure-u-md-2-3 pure-u-1-2"]>ul>li:nth-of-type(2)>a@text
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
<js>
let bookId = baseUrl.split("/").slice(-1)[0];
let chapterList = java.ajax(`https://ttkan.co/api/nq/amp_novel_chapters?novel_id=${bookId}`);
java.put("bookId",bookId);
java.put("chapterList",chapterList);
chapterList;
</js>
$.items[-1].chapter_name
ruleBookInfo.name: div[class="pure-u-xl-5-6 pure-u-lg-5-6 pure-u-md-2-3 pure-u-1-2"]>ul>li:first-of-type>h1@text

header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}

ruleExplore.author: #newscontent>div.l>ul>li>span:nth-of-type(4)@text
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookUrl = result.select("a:first-of-type").attr("href");
let bookId = bookUrl.match(/_(\d+)\//)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "http://img.xgbqiuge.com/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>
ruleExplore.name: #newscontent>div.l>ul>li>span:nth-of-type(2)>a@text
